name: Money Maker (itch) (OllieWright)
description:
A game about making money. Who doesn't like capitalism?

Unfortunately I had barely any time to spend on this project as my teammates did their best impression of Harold Holt in 1967 and disappeared off the face of the earth, and I was forced to scrap code and plans that I had spent the majority of my time on, and made this in scratch in about an hour and a half. Technically part of "team" Red Barbarian.

Credits:
Ollie Wright - Everything other than the background
Background - https://dribbble.com/shots/411858-8-bit-Office
